snippet: Giants receiver Victor Cruz apologized for a Twitter message in the wake of George Zimmerman’s being acquitted of second-degree murder in the death of Trayvon Martin.
abstract: New York Giants receiver Victor Cruz apologizes for Twitter message in wake of George Zimmerman’s acquittal of murder charges in the death of Trayvon Martin.
lead_paragraph: Giants receiver Victor Cruz apologized for a Twitter message in the wake of George Zimmerman’s being acquitted of second-degree murder in the death of Trayvon Martin.

headline.main: Giants’ Cruz Apologizes for Twitter Message After Zimmerman’s Acquittal
